metadata.title: CVE-2021-32437 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The gf_hinter_finalize function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file in theMP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
